column1: big appeal for lbw first up , but umpire Tim Robinson is unmoved. Swing in the air. This one comes back in from outside off to hit Tamim on middle as he plays outside the line. Perhaps height was in question. Super start for Multan
looks to step out and swing this to neighbouring Abu Dhabi, beaten. Wild, wild swing towards cow corner this time. Pretty poor.
right into the blockhole, dug out towards short midwicket. Tamim made to stretch a long way as he completes the run
full and angling away from wide of the crease, defended with soft hands
shapes to cut but he's cramped for room, beaten. This one nipped away late
this one comes back in from length on middle to hit the pad as Kamran looks to work this to the leg side
length delivery slanting in towards leg stump, he's struck on the thigh pad as he tried to defend
slants one down leg, Tamim looks to whip this behind square. Good take by Sanga
beauty! This one wobbled away just a bit to square him up. He was looking to defend but with minimal feet movement
the bounce troubles him this time. Short of length ball that jags back in sharply to hit him on the stomach. Tamim caught on the hop as he looks to work this behind square.

ultra edge says nothing. Tamim survives and the review is successful. Tamim was in all sorts of trouble as he shaped to hook the short ball, got into a bit of a mess but the ball whizzed past quicker than he anticipated. Given out initially, but overturned. What's worse? It's called wide
walks across and punches this length ball to cover point where there's a misfield

beaten for pace, takes on the short ball and skies it straight to square leg. Kamran Akmal's stay is a short one. Was in no position to play the pull. Mohammad Irfan is Multan Sultan's first wicket-taker in PSL history. The guy who captain Malik didn't remember at the toss takes the catch.
gets right on top of the bounce as he defends this short of length delivery
turns this full delivery on middle and leg towards square leg
squared him up with the length. Full on middle, this one nipped away late to roll off a thick outside edge to point
length on leg stump, he uses the pace nicely to tickle it to fine leg. That's the first boundary of PSL 2018
full on leg stump,  Smith looks to flick but is overbalanced and misses it as the ball strikes his pad
skiddy bouncer on middle, Smith sways away and watches this zip through to the keeper. That was way over his head, good call from the umpire
the good old french cut that sneaks past leg stump. On another day, the leg stump would've taken a walk. Smith pokes at this delivery outside the line, gets a massive inside edge. Lucky break
shows the full face of the bat in defence
walks across the stumps and whips this incoming length ball behind square to fine leg. Premeditated stroke, used the bowler's pace and bounce to good effect this time. One bounce into the ropes.
steps out, takes it on the full and belts this through extra cover. In stepping out, he also moved across outside leg to make room. Lovely from Tamim.

helped to fine leg where Junaid Khan has taken a stunner. Picked up the ball even as it may have been hovering around the ring of fire, ran in a couple of steps and dived full length forward to complete it. Tamim was beaten for pace this time even as he tried to repeat what he just did a couple of deliveries ago. Walked across to help it along but not to be this time.
excellent delivery, excellent leave. Slants across a short of length ball just around off, Hafeez gets on top of the bounce but doesn't bother playing at that
steps out but in doing so, he nearly yorks himself. Ends up squeezing it towards cover
full and angling away from wide of the crease, left alone
what a welcome to the crease. Starts off with a juicy half-volley, Smith simply wallops this back over his head. Lovely punch, disdainfully done
mistimes this slog back to the bowler. Looked to drag this over mid-on but toe-ended this. Junaid threatens to throw this back to Smith, glares exchanged.
looks to flay this short of length delivery through point but is cramped for room.
right back and across as he defends
yorker-length on off stump, squeezed back to the bowler
nips away off the seam to beat the attempted punch. Smith can't believe how much that deviated.
lovely delivery. Angles a length delivery across Hafeez, who lets it go
steps out and swings this short of length delivery over midwicket. No timing or power behind that, just manages to elude the infield
gets right to the pitch of the ball and defends this to cover
beaten by one that jags away off the seam. Hafeez squared up, hangs his bat out to run it down, but is beaten
disconcerting bounce, Hafeez is off balance as he dabs this off his toes to the off side
edged but just wide of second slip. Off the shoulder of the bat to third man
beaten. Steps out to swing over mid-on but can't get to the pitch. Looked to throw the kitchen sink at that
goes back and across as he defends this length delivery back towards the bowler
squirts this length delivery to point
low full toss which he creams through cover, excellent work by Saif Badar, who runs across from the infield to cut that off
works this length delivery on middle and leg to deep fine leg
the short-arm jab towards deep midwicket. Didn't get the kind of power he would've liked on the stroke through
starts with a slider that drifts in to beat the inside edge and hit the pad
fired in again, Smith shows the full face of the bat in defence

long-on was in business briefly but he can only watch this sail over. Smith sees the flight and goes over the infield, ended up dragging it just a touch but got enough bat on it. First six of PSL 2018

gets his man this time and Tahir is on his lap of honour. Oh, wait. He's stopped because the batsman has reviewed. Smith is beaten by the googly as he pushes outside the line. Hit on middle. Smith checks with his partner and takes the review. Did he get an inside edge? Unlikely because he would've gone up immediately if that was the case. The only question is height. Given out on the field, and the umpire's call will be overturned as ball tracking shows it would've gone over. The ball flew off the pad, beat the keeper and raced to the boundary. There's confusion over whether that was a dead ball or should've been given four leg-byes. Dead ball, we're informed.
heaves this towards deep mdiwicket, off a thick inside edge, good fielding
pulled but not all that well, into the gap at deep midwicket though
floats this full delivery in from wide of the crease, Hafeez plays outside the line and gets a thick inside edge to square leg
steers this length ball outside off to third man
dropped! This was a tough chance on his followthrough. Hafeez was looking to go over the top but hit it high on the bat. Opportunity nonetheless
pulled but not in control, just rolls past square leg
clobbers this pull from outside off to the deep midwicket boundary. Pickes the bones out of that
looks to squeeze this behind point but missed. Bowler went full outside off this time
steps out and wallops this full toss over long-on. Got it off the middle. Made the movement even before Tahir delivered. Lovely swing of the bat
eased with the spin to extra cover
steers this to backward point
fired full on off, eased back towards the bowler

flat hit but straight to Pollard, who has big, bucket hands at wide long-on. Nicely tossed up, Smith ends up hitting this full delivery across the line from way outside off when he may have been better off looking to hit straighter. Big wicket, big moment possibly.
fired in at length on middle, turned to the leg side
good length and in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off and he can't get this dab off the outside edge past Pollard at slip. It bounces off the big man though
back of a length on leg stump, clipped to deep square
full and just outside off stump. Tapped back towards the bowler
short of a length and down leg side. Can't get bat on the attempted glance
short ball on leg stump, swivels and plays a controlled pull to deep square

dropped. Pollard grasses it low to his right at slip. This length ball jags in and cramps Hafeez who is trying to dab to third man again. It's an outside edge that's dying on Pollard who manages to get under it but can't hold on
clears the straight boundary after a delightful jump down the track to reach the pitch of this. It's a length ball on off stump and he gives himself enough room for a clean swing
length on off stump, driven along the floor to long-off
length on off stump, driven to sweeper cover
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
is that dropped? Yes it is. Thick edge sneaks through Sanga's attempt. Short ball outside off and once again he gets an edge after being cramped on the late cut
back of a length on middle stump, gets low and carts this to deep square's left. The fielder puts in the sprint and the slide to push this back in
good length on off stump, driven on the up to mid-off
slapped away. No edging business here. Bang off the middle of the bat as he meets this length ball on the up, wide outside off. Sweeper has no chance to his right
full and angled in at leg stump. Nudged to long-on's right off the front foot
back of a length on off stump, opens the face and steers this to third man
overpitched on leg stump, driven back to the bowler who parried it past the stumps with an outstretched right arm
full toss on leg stump, flicked straight to fine leg
short of a length outside off, guided to third man's right with the angle
attempted bouncer sails way down leg side as the batsman ducks
back of a length and in at leg stump. Deflected into the square leg region off the thigh guard
short of a length in the corridor, dabbed to third man
short of a length outside off, dropped into the off side with soft hands
short of a length outside off, pushed to third man with the angle
chipped into the leg side as he closes the face early on the glance. But it lands between the bowler and midwicket. Short of a length ball got too big on Haris
sliced to the extra cover boundary after stepping out. It's slanted across him on a good length and he doesn't get all of this. It's off the bottom part of the bat but it's placed well
good length on middle stump, pushed back towards the bowler
back of a length on middle stump, swatted straight to deep square
nicely timed punch as he backs away, but he finds sweeper cover. Another short of a length ball from Junaid
offcutter, floated up outside off. Driven straight to extra cover
finds deep square on the bounce. Swivels for the hook and makes good contact, but he can't steer it fine enough
cramps him with a length ball at off stump, he leaps and drops this pitch side on the off side
back of a length and angled across of stump. Tapped to midwicket off the back foot
swipes and misses. Backs away in anticipation of Viljoen's cramping line. He's predicted well, but there's too much pace for him as he looks to bludgeon this. It sails over the stumps
holes out to long-on. Similar shot attempt as the last ball. Backs away and sets up for the pull. It has extra bounce this time and is still pacey. Slices a running catch for long-on

short ball outside off, Hafeez wafts and misses. Or so it appears. It dips to Sangakarra's left and he takes it one-handed, in the nick of time. And he thinks there's an edge on that. The only one appealing. And they take the review for it after the umpire says no. The decision stands. Nowhere close to an edge
length on middle stump, flicked to deep square
full at off stump, driven through cover
nearly chops on as he looks to play on the back foot. This skids through from a length on middle stump and it creeps between leg stump and back leg
tossed up outside off, miscued slog falls short of Pollard at long-on
floated up at a length, wide outside off. Reaches out and tries to clear cover. Ends up hitting it to long-off's left on the bounce
back of a length on off stump, tapped into the covers from the crease
length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short ball slanted across off stump. He has premeditated a ramp over short fine. Looks awkward as he tries to contort to keep up his strategy. Beaten while he's at it
slower ball, full and wide outside off. Reaches out with a long stride and manages to carve this wide of mid-off. That's his fifty
short and just outside off. Hangs deep in the crease and lifts this square on the off side. Point and third man are in. Nicely done from Hafeez
yorker on leg stump, can't get bat on the flick. Deflected into the covers

top edge and it clears the fine leg boundary. Tanvir bowls short yet again, despite having third man and fine leg in. Not that fine leg would've reached this. The hook flies off the top edge and it's really fine
superb hit! Tanvir misses the length on his yorker. It's overpitched on leg, he gets the front foot out of the way and lifts this over long-on with a check drive. Unreal stroke.
full toss outside off, stands his ground and lifts this with control. Over the non-striker, wide of long-off. One bounce and four
pulled straight to square leg. A change of pace and length. Dug in short on middle stump and he drags it straight into the mid-riff of the fielder there
low full toss wide outside off, sliced to point's right and he manages to get down and stop that. Nearly squeezed that through
buh-bye! Full toss, knee height, outside off. That's good pace, that's good height, that's enough room. Sammy sends it flying over wide long-on
overpitched wide outside off and he's creamed it flat to the extra cover boundary. Makes full use of his reach and gets to this despite having the front leg out of the way and in the leg side
slower ball, short on off stump and he nearly gets another wicket at square leg. Sammy chips this and it falls short of the fielder there
full on off stump, drilled straight to extra cover
back of a length on middle stump. Sammy static and therefore cramped. Can only manage to nudge this to short fine
full on off stump, driven to long-off along the floor
gets it wide of long-on. Slower ball, dug in short and wide outside off. Sammy reaches out and spanks it on the rise. Poor from Tanvir

outside edge straight to the keeper. It's a length ball with a lot of room. He looks to club across the line without too much feet and ends up too far from it. The perfect T20 innings from Sammy. It's over
slower ball, back of a length on leg stump. Hangs back in the crease and looks to tickle this fine. Gets a glove on it and it's only a single
back of a length and down leg side. Looks to flick and misses
short of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
tucked away into the leg side behind square, timed nicely
on the pads, flicked neatly into the gap between midwicket and deep square. Excellent running
back of length on middle and leg, Sanga wrists this to the right of square leg for an easy single
full and swinging away from outside off, left alone
lovely square drive but can't pierce the packed off side ring, straight to point
skiddy short ball to Sanga, who taps it gently into the off side for a quick single
gets back and across as he defends this away-going length ball
play and a miss. Looking to hit on the up but is done in by the angle and pace as well
super stop at point by Asghar. There was width and Shehzad struck this well. Sammy goes all the way from mid-off to high five his young colleague

he's whipped this straight to deep fine leg. Shehzad wasn't in any control of the stroke. Was caught on the hop as he tried to work this behind square, the ball flew off the blade to the man in the deep.
plenty of zip off the deck but the line's down leg, wide called and rightly so
hits the top part of the bat as he goes back and across to defend.
on leg stump and this races away off the deflection from the thigh pad. Easy runs
reaches out to drive, can't get the timing on this full and wide delivery. Played towards cover
floats this full outside off, defended to extra cover
slashed to the point boundary. Picked the length early, stayed back and brought out his big blade to put that away
works this off his hip to fine leg
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
classic Sanga square drive. Width on offer, he's down on one knee as he times this beautifully to the off side fence
straighter and fuller on middle, defended back down the pitch
banged in short, this is way over the batsman's head, but he's overstepped too. That means a free-hit. Replays suggest it was a harsh call
he looks to swing this short ball over deep square, played through too early. Beaten
right on top of the bounce as he defends this short of length delivery towards point
length delivery on middle from wide of the crease, defended from the crease
taps this gently towards the man coming in from mid-on, hares across for a single
makes room and cuts towards point for an easy single
nice flight and drift into middle, defended with the spin
mistimes an attempted cut to Sammy at cover. At the moment, Maqsood is just swinging at deliveries
looks to force this through cover, can't pick the gap

steps out to go over the top, the bowler sees him charging and fires it in, eased to mid-on. There's a direct hit at the bowler's end, but Sanga was well in. Third umpire being called in lent some artificial excitement. Pressure building on Maqsood
connects, finally. This is too short, he makes room and punches this through cover. Lovely timing
dabs this towards the man coming in from cover for a quick single
amazing how one shot has a boomerang effect. Maqsood swivels back and helps this short ball way over the fine leg boundary
Smith has made a mess of it at deep square, but it was a tough chance alright. This was too short from Hammad, once again Maqsood is ready for the pull, hits it well too. Gets a move-on, finally.
swing and a miss, this was much fuller and moving away from off stump.
picks the length early as he muscles this pull on the bounce to deep midwicket. At 120kph, bowling short is a crime. Very poor from Hammad
beaten by one that moves away late from off stump
leans forward and turns this tossed up delivery back to the bowler
fired on middle and leg, turned to deep square leg
drifts in and spins away from length on middle, punched to long-on
full and drifting away from around the stumps, driven to sweeper cover
turns this indrifter towards midwicket for a quick single
makes the early adjustment by giving himself room and slap this shortish delivery to sweeper cover
tossed up on middle, turned to the leg side
too short, he swivels back and pulls to deep square where a misfield gives them a second
flatter on middle, punched to long-on
pushed through quick and flat again on middle, eased down to long-on
mistimed towards long-off. Sanga looked to clear the ropes but failed to get any power, Hammad nearly over-ran there but recovers well to stop this
looks to smack this too hard over cover, ends up getting the bottom part of the bat

that's the end of Maqsood show. He was trying to hit every single delivery, ends up slicing this to long-off. Stepped out to go straight over the bowler's head but didn't get underneath the flight, went through with the stroke only to find the big hands of Jordan.
turns this back to the bowler with the spin
lunges forward and defends, excellent work to stop that off his own bowling
turned with the spin to deep square
drifts in a full delivery on off, defended to cover, wants the single but is sent back
steps out and works this down to long-on
pulled to deep square, once again Ibtisam bowls short
eased with the spin to Sammy, who misfields at short covet to concede a run.
flatter one on middle, milked to long-on
this one's an indrifter that goes straight on, rolls off a thick inside edge to midwicket. Malik was looking to play straighter
backs away and hits this wrong'un with the spin over long-off. All class, lined himself up and slapped it away
works this down to long-on for an easy single
back of a length on off stump, tapped to mid-off on the up
full on off stump, closes the face too early as he looks to flick through midwicket. Gets it to mid-off off the leading edge
another leading edge as he looks to flick. This one is shorter than the last ball. Trickles to extra cover
length on leg stump, clipped to fine leg
short of a length on middle stump, shovelled to deep square's right with a horizontal bat
inside edge towards short fine as he steps out and looks to punch on the up. This length ball skids into him off the pitch
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
full and fired onto the pads. Tickled straight to short fine
good length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
low full toss on middle stump, driven to long-on
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
steers an arm ball to deep backward square. It's short of a length on middle stump and he plays a short-arm pull
good length on middle stump, steps out and whips to deep midwicket
loooong hit from Malik. Steps out against the young man, meets it at the pitch and opens his body to hit this straight over the sightscreen
length on leg stump, flicked through midwicket
good length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length and pushed flat on middle stump. Steps out and squeezes it to long-on off the toe-end
drilled straight. It's a full ball outside off, he plants the front leg to reach it and manages to lift it over Malik
dropped short on leg stump. He stands tall, allows it to come on and pulls to the long leg boundary. Poor start
good length on off stump. Dead-batted into the pitch
short of a length outside off. Steps out and slashes. Beaten
short on off stump, pulled straight to deep midwicket

swivels and lifts it over the long leg boundary to bring up fifty. Classy from Sanga. It's a short of a length ball skidding at middle stump. He gets inside the line and guides it off the face. Fine leg is in, it's a safe shot
length on off stump, shuffles and taps to short fine's right
good length on middle stump, pushed to mid-on
length on leg stump, tickled fine from the crease
short of a length outside off, under-edge on the attempted cut shot
bouncer on middle stump, ducks under it
gets him! Wahab returns and gives Sammy the wicket. It's a length ball outside off and Sanga doesn't lean into this cover drive. It's a regulation edge and an easy catch
outside edge lands short of first slip. Gets this to climb at him in the corridor but he plays with soft hands
short and wide outside off, cut straight to point

run out chance but the direct hit doesn't come. He steps out and gets this on his pad as he tries to flick. It lobs into the off side. Pollard calls, Malik says no, goes back and then decides to run through. He's nowhere near making it at the non-striker's end but point can't hit the stumps
short of a length on leg stump, deflected fine with a glance
back of a length on leg stump, clipped straight to short fine
back of a length on leg stump, whipped between deep square and deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, backs away and slaps it over point
short ball, wide outside off. Looks to launch this over square leg with a pull but he's beaten
looks to go straight but the angle gives the shuffling Pollard enough time to whip it past short fine leg
back of a length and in at leg stump. Looks to tickle it fine but cops it on the thigh
good length and angled in at middle stump. Looks to defend on the front foot and gets it to midwicket off the inside half of the bat
length outside off, steered to third man's left and his throw on the bounce is fumbled by Kamran Akmal. It allows them a third run at midwicket
length ball, very wide outside off. Pollard chases with no feet. Gets a big outside edge that runs very fine to the third man boundary
back of a length on leg stump, clipped straight to short fine off the back foot
short of a length on leg stump. Can't get bat on the flick, but he will get a single for his team as Malik calls through and beats Wahab
short of a length outside off, nudged wide of third man and they take on Ibtisam's throw to pick up two
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
short ball at off stump. Thumps the pull, along the floor to deep midwicket's right and a fumble allows them an easy second

Dwayne Smith over-runs at deep square and completely misses this. Another short ball, pulled with a short-arm movement. It's going to land to Smith's left but he's a yard ahead and has no chance to his right in the end
yorker just outside off. Skips into the leg side and steers to sweeper cover
creams it between mid-off and extra cover. Length ball is very wide, but Pollard's reach is no wee thing. Punches on the up and finds four
back of a length and in at middle stump. Cops it on the thigh as he looks to flick. Looks like there's some bat on it too
slower ball dropped short outside off. Backs away and scythes with force, straight to sweeper
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep square
low full toss on leg stump, tapped to deep midwicket
does it with five balls to spare. Shoaib Malik swivels and brings out an old-fashioned slog to send this length ball over square leg
